dublin_core.dcvalue: To assess whether spatiotemporal image correlation STIC volumes from fetuses at 11 0 to 13 6 weeks gestation can be obtained by a non expert and whether fetal echocardiography can be performed via a telemedicine link providing a remote and reproducible diagnosis of the fetal heart condition
Ultrasound in obstetrics And gynecology : the official journal of the International Society of Ultrasound in Obstetrics and Gynecology
Fetal echocardiography at 11 + 0 to 13 + 6 weeks using four-dimensional spatiotemporal image correlation telemedicine via an Internet link: a pilot study.
